          <title>
            <string language="es">Programación lineal con pizarra interactiva</string>
            <string language="en">Linear programming with an interactive blackboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lineare Programmierung mit einer interaktiven 
Tafel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Programmation linéaire avec un tableau noir 
interactif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Programação linear com um quadro-negro 
interativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmazione lineare con una lavagna

            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμικός προγραμματισμός με έναν διαλογικό πίνακα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que permite resolver sencillos problemas de programación lineal, geométricamente</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which allows the user to solve linear programming problems geometrically</string>
